resources.string: Usa el menu para iniciar una nueva partida o, durante el juego, para ver como jugar.

Juego cargado!
Las acciones, compras y monedas
disponibles se muestran en el 
tregistro como a/c/(m)
Iniciar un nuevo juego en el servidor

Please Read!

Rio Grande Games, the publisher of Dominion, has asked us to discontinue Androminion as they launch their official digital version of the game. As such, this will be the last major revision; Androminion will be removed from the market at the end of the month. Thanks to all of you who have contributed to the project, submitted bug reports, or spread the word -- without you Androminion would not be as polished and popular as it is today.

On behalf of the Androminion team, it has been fun.
-:ankur

Version 3.01

* Fixed UI for smaller screens
* Added solitare play
* Some more bugfixes

Version 3.00

* Many gameplay bugfixes
* Optimized user interface with tablet support
* Compatibility: Android 2.2+

Version 2.05

* Many gameplay bugfixes
* We lied about 2.04 -- this actually the last version for Android 1.5 - 2.1

Version 2.04

* Translation to Dutch
* Bugfixes
* Last version for Android 1.5 and 1.6

Version 2.03

* Possession!
* Additional translations
* Many, many bugfixes and enhancements

Version 2.02

* Fix crashes on Android 4.x
* More intuitive Moat behavior
* Many other bugfixes and enhancements

Want greater ability to choose your own kingdom cards? You can now launch Androminion directly from DominionShuffle!

Version 2.0

It has been a long while in coming, but we hope this update will have been worth the wait! There are so many changes that we can\'t list them all here, but below are some highlights:

* More expansions! Most of the cards from Alchemy, Prosperity, Cornucopia, and Hinterlands are now available.
* More game options! Chose from various random or preset decks, with 2-4 players.
* More AI options! Introducing new AIs Chuck, Mary, and Sarah.
* More bugfixes! Also more bugs, probably.
* Same great taste!

Androminion is now open source! This update would not have been possible without the help of a number of contributors; please view the credits tab. You too can help! Submit bug reports, feature requests, translations, and more on
http://androminion.googlecode.com
Los registros se guardaran en la tarjeta SD como archivos de texto.
Directorio para guardar los registros (se creara si es necesario)
